keyword: calories in fries at burger king
title: Calories in Fries at Burger King
meta_description: Discover calories in fries at Burger King for medium size, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and serving variations to help track your meal.
h1: Calories in Fries at Burger King
assumptions: Medium french fries (about 113 g), fried in vegetable oil, standard Burger King preparation; values from official or averaged data.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, portion size, oil type, and preparation; check Burger King app or menu for latest info.

quick_answer.text: A medium serving of Burger King fries has about 380 kcal and 52 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with fast food menus.

faqs.q: How many calories in medium fries at Burger King?
What are the carbs in Burger King fries?
faqs.a: 52 g total carbs, including 5 g fiber, in a medium order.

faqs.q: Are Burger King fries high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 390 mg sodium per medium serving.

faqs.q: Calories in large fries at Burger King?
faqs.a: Approximately 490 kcal for a large serving.

faqs.q: Do Burger King fries have trans fat?
faqs.a: Typically 0 g trans fat, but total fat is 18 g per medium.
